svg.text: Higher-Order Structure Mapping Development-as-Golf to Open Problems

g.text: F_embed: Golf ‚Üí Semantic Space (embedding prompts/responses in ‚Ñù‚Åø)
F_proj: Semantic ‚Üí Golf (dimensional reduction ‚Ñù‚Åø ‚Üí ‚Ñù¬≤ via PCA/t-SNE)
F_graph: Semantic ‚Üí Graph Theory (discretize continuous space)
F_opt: Semantic ‚Üí Optimization (view as manifold optimization problem)
‚Ä¢ Category Theory provides universal constructions applying to all domains
‚Ä¢ Information Geometry measures semantic distances using Fisher metrics
‚Ä¢ Topology characterizes hazards and critical points (out-of-bounds regions)

svg.text: All paths commute (up to natural isomorphism) ‚Äî Coherence Theorem 9.1
